data.name: New Engine No Prop Clipping/SD
data.rules:
Complete the game without using prop clipping. Turrets and Hopper mines aren't considered as props (Those are NPC's). Save deletion is NOT allowed. 

Use Livesplit to get without loads time. No scripts. 

Console commands that are allowed: 
cl_showpos 
toggle_duck 
r_portalsopenall 
fps_max 
reload 
kill 

Any other console exclusive commands are not allowed (wait, sv_cheats 1, ch_createairboat, etc.).

You are also allowed to bind a command to multiple keys (for example having jump bound to space and mousewheel). Binding multiple commands to one key is allowed (For example bind c "reload; fps_max 30"). 

No HUD modifications that give you an advantage (for example disabling white flashes). 

Using maps from different versions is not allowed, this means you must use maps consistent with the version of the game you are running. (i.e. can't take maps from SteamPipe and use them in Ghosting)
